name: project-plus
description: Simply awesome project management in Atom.

showPath.title: Show Project Path
showPath.description: Show project folder paths under the name of each project.

projectHome.title: Project Home
projectHome.description: The directory where projects are assumed to be located. Projects outside of this directory will never be shown in the project finder. NOTE: This is a case-sensitive field.

newWindow.title: Open in New Window
newWindow.description: Open projects in a new window by default. `shift-enter` will trigger the opposite behavior.

autoDiscover.title: Auto Discover Projects
autoDiscover.description: In addition to saved projects, the project finder will include all projects that have ever been opened by atom.

blacklist.title: Blacklist
blacklist.description: A regular expression to match project paths that should be excluded from the project manager.
